text:
Good morning, Mano!
Sorry for asking you to come earlier than planned.

No, not at all...
The location for the PV shoot was added, right?

Yeah, I just heard the details myself...
And get this, we're shooting at an amusement park!

I shared the image cuts we took the other day
with the video director who'll be making the PV...

...And they really liked them,
so they want to add more shots to the video.

Oh, I see...
That's how it was...

Oh! Sorry for rushing you right after you arrived,
but shall we move right away?

I'm going to go turn the car around,
so wait for me downstairs at the office...
